statements: SELECT * FROM HealthMetrics ORDER BY record_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT person_id, heart_rate FROM HealthMetrics WHERE temperature > 98.6
SELECT metric_id, steps FROM HealthMetrics WHERE heart_rate < 60
SELECT MIN(heart_rate), MAX(temperature) FROM HealthMetrics
SELECT * FROM HealthMetrics WHERE person_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc'
SELECT metric_id, person_id, record_timestamp, heart_rate, temperature, steps FROM HealthMetrics WHERE person_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY record_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM HealthMetrics WHERE metric_id = '7be33f9a-373c-4b4b-aa7e-71140442e687';
SELECT person_id, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM HealthMetrics GROUP BY person_id HAVING MAX(heart_rate) > 100 ORDER BY max_heart_rate DESC;
SELECT person_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM HealthMetrics WHERE record_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY person_id ORDER BY avg_temperature ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM HealthMetrics WHERE steps > 10000;
SELECT * FROM health_metrics WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT heart_rate, steps FROM health_metrics WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT SUM(calories_burned) AS total_calories FROM health_metrics WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT name, age, gender FROM user_info WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name
SELECT user_id, weight, height FROM user_info WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT user_id, heart_rate, steps FROM health_metrics WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT heart_rate, steps, calories_burned FROM health_metrics WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY height DESC
SELECT user_id, name, age FROM user_info WHERE weight < 70 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT user_id, heart_rate, steps, calories_burned FROM health_metrics WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT * FROM health_metrics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT heart_rate, steps FROM health_metrics WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, age FROM user_profile WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT device_type, device_model FROM wearable_devices WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT timestamp, steps, heart_rate FROM health_metrics WHERE user_id = 4 AND steps > 10000 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM health_metrics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM user_profile WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM wearable_devices WHERE device_type = 'Smartwatch' ORDER BY device_id;
SELECT timestamp, heart_rate FROM health_metrics WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND steps < 5000;
SELECT user_name, device_type FROM user_profile JOIN wearable_devices ON user_profile.user_id = wearable_devices.user_id;
SELECT * FROM health_metrics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, heart_rate FROM health_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, age FROM user_profile WHERE age > 30;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM device_information WHERE device_name LIKE 'Fit%';
SELECT user_id, data_type, data_value FROM research_data WHERE data_type = 'blood_pressure';
SELECT * FROM health_metrics WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, heart_rate, step_count FROM health_metrics WHERE user_id = 3 AND timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT u.name, h.heart_rate, h.step_count FROM user_profile u JOIN health_metrics h ON u.user_id = h.user_id WHERE h.timestamp >= '2021-05-01' ORDER BY h.timestamp DESC;
SELECT r.user_id, AVG(r.data_value) AS avg_data_value FROM research_data r JOIN health_metrics h ON r.user_id = h.user_id WHERE r.data_type = 'Blood Pressure' GROUP BY r.user_id;
SELECT d.device_name, COUNT(*) AS records_count FROM device_information d JOIN health_metrics h ON d.user_id = h.user_id GROUP BY d.device_name ORDER BY records_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM wearable_devices;
SELECT user_id, device_type, manufacturing_date FROM wearable_devices WHERE device_type = 'Smartwatch';
SELECT * FROM health_metrics WHERE metric_type = 'Heart Rate' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date, center_name FROM research_studies JOIN research_centers ON research_studies.center_id = research_centers.center_id;
SELECT * FROM wearable_devices;
SELECT user_id, device_type FROM wearable_devices ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_metrics WHERE metric_value > 50 AND metric_type = 'Heart Rate';
SELECT users.first_name, users.last_name, research_studies.study_name FROM users JOIN research_studies ON users.user_id = research_studies.center_id;
SELECT center_name, location FROM research_centers WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
